item.description:
Careful not to fall asleep, because if you do, we'll draw funny faces on you! Just kidding, we'd just make you play Sleepprov instead. If none of this makes sense to you it's ok, it's improvisational meetup detail writing.

Moving on...

Come on out Thursday for another week of games, merriment, and laughter. Bring smiles and friends for the fun. We'll be sure to try out some new games and old.

And no worries if you have never done improv ever. There's no experience required. Just come and let yourself be open to your imganination.

Hope to see you all soon!

Any questions about the incubator or this week's meetup in particular, email me!

Cheers

Jason J.
item.name: An Improvmare on Mt. Auburn Street!
